extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQ: ELEC 274 and ELEC 276 or ELEC 278 and registered in BSCE
EXCLUSION: ELEC 377

basic.description: Layered operating systems for conventional shared memory computers: concurrent processes. Synchronization and communication. Concurrent algorithms. Scheduling. Deadlock. Memory management. Protection. File systems. Device management. Typical layers.
basic.subject: CMPE
basic.title: Operating Systems
